name: Complete Wedding Planning
description: Let us handle every aspect of your wedding, from venue selection to catering, ensuring a seamless and stress-free celebration.

name: Day-of Coordination
description: Relax and enjoy your wedding day while we manage the details, coordinate vendors, and ensure a smooth event from start to finish.

name: Decor and Theme Design
description: Create the perfect ambiance with our expert decor and theme design services, tailored to match your wedding vision and style.

name: Venue Selection and Booking
description: Let us assist you in finding and booking the ideal venue for your wedding, ensuring a beautiful and memorable setting.

name: Vendor Coordination
description: We'll handle all vendor communications and coordination to ensure a cohesive and well-executed wedding day.

name: Destination Wedding Planning
description: Turn your dream destination wedding into reality with our expertise in planning and organizing events in exotic locations.
